snippet: Gov. Bobby Jindal of Louisiana said the money was part of the $1 billion that BP agreed to pay after the 2010 Deepwater Horizon oil spill.
abstract: Louisiana Gov Bobby Jindal says BP has agreed to finance $340 million in restoration projects in Gulf of Mexico, part of $1 billion settlement company agreed to pay after 2010 Deepwater Horizon oil spill.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Bobby Jindal of Louisiana said the money was part of the $1 billion that BP agreed to pay after the 2010 Deepwater Horizon oil spill.

headline.seo: BP Will Pay for $340 Million in Gulf Restoration Projects
headline.main: BP Will Finance $340 Million in Gulf Restoration Projects
headline.print_headline: BP Will Finance $340 Million In Gulf Restoration Projects
